title: Ras malai
ingredients: ['425g ricotta cheese', '4 tablespoons caster sugar', '350ml full fat milk', '350ml double cream', '200g caster sugar', '1/4 teaspoon ground cardamom', '1/2 teaspoon rose water (optional)', '1 pinch saffron', '1 tablespoon chopped blanched almonds', '2 teaspoons chopped pistachio nuts']
